translations: v.制度化（institutionalise 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Once the exclusive province of the wealthy, travel and tourism have become an institutionalised way of life for most of the population.
sentences.translation: 旅游曾经是富人的专属领域，如今已成为大多数人约定俗成的生活方式。
史蒂夫的方式已经成了制度。

sentences.sentence: This branching out has been institutionalised and expanded.
sentences.translation: 这种拓展已被制度化并进一步扩张了。
